attributes.additional_details: Dont force a decision on the people, allow them to make their own choices. We only have one life we shouldnt be restricted in what we can do.
attributes.background: Stop taking our rights and freedom from us. Let the people make their own decisions like we do with any other virus. Passports would mean we can't do simple things like go for a meal or a drink with family. It's a step to far and we should all be entitled to live our lives.
